courses.title: Kubernetes Fundamentals
courses.description: Learn the fundamental building blocks of Kubernetes with hands-on on explanations.

courses.title: Kubernetes Applications
courses.description: Discover different applications you can easily start on Kubernetes.

courses.title: Kubernetes Serverless
courses.description: Discover different techniques for running apps and functions on Kubernetes.

courses.title: Kubernetes Pipelines
courses.description: Discover different tools and techniques for continuous delivery on Kubernetes.

courses.title: Kubernetes Observability
courses.description: Learn techniques for inspecting Kubernetes and your applications distributed across a cluster.
